title.narrative: Emergency response in the education area

description.narrative: UNICEF CO advocated and provided technical and financial assistance to the Ministry of Education´s efforts to include Venezuelan children and adolescents into the national education system. 117 239 children and adolescents and 29 712 parents were reached through the strategies implemented. Under the leadership of UNICEF Regional Office for Latin America and the Caribbean, UNICEF Ecuador accessed “Education Cannot Wait” financial resources for promoting educational inclusion of Venezuelan children and preventing of xenophobia in schools, based on the situation analysis of Venezuelan children's rights to education developed by UNICEF Ecuador, and approved by Ministry of Education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
